subject: Horse Racing
Horsemanship and Equestrian Events
lead_paragraph: Big Buck’s became the first horse to win 17 straight British jump races when he eased to a fourth consecutive victory in the Liverpool Hurdle on the opening day of the Aintree Festival.
snippet: Big Buck’s became the first horse to win 17 straight British jump races when he eased to a fourth consecutive victory in the Liverpool Hurdle on the opening day of the Aintree Festival.
